name: NIGHT OUT (DX DESIGN)
description:
tells of a man named Rowbert who was working as a forest ranger when things were fine

 once Upon a time someone told rowbert but had not been informed that the person was missing somewhere rowbert pub thought it was just a hallucination but not long after the radio sounded but the radio sound broke so rowbert was looking for oddities on the way he found a diskette and then he set it up not long ago there is a warning.................................

This game has different plots and you have to be wise in choosing the storyline so that Rowbert survives

bercerita tentang seorang pria bernama Rowbert yang bekerja sebagai penjaga hutan ketika semuanya baik-baik saja

sampai suatu ketika ada yang bilang ke rowbert tapi belum dikasih tahu  orang itu hilang di rowbert pun mengira cuma halusinasi tapi gak lama bunyi radio tapi suara radio pecah jadi rowbert mencari keanehan di perjalanan menemukan disket trus dia pasang gak lama ada peringatan.............................

Game ini memiliki plot yang berbeda-beda dan kamu harus bijak dalam memilih jalan cerita agar Rowbert bisa bertahan

ouh iya game horor ini tidak terlalu menakutkan yaaa

:D

Vidio proses pembuatan game nya
